channel.title: English help
channel.description:
i need sme 1 to help me with original writing also known as creative writing, wat i mean by help is sme 1 post there creative/original writing here, and the one i will like i will use. also everyone that posts a piece of work i will rep them and also pay back them the favour in some way.
so plZ sme 1 help me thnak u

item.title: English help
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

If you copy an essay from web you can be also taken for cheating.
But you can give him a tips to a essay, thats is not cheating.

You can write about something you know about,
A story about love,
A nightmare,
Last day of your life,
If I was the President
or a Terrorist attack.

There you have some idea.

Read full topic

item.title: English help
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:3, topic:146812”]You can’t give rep.
And Rep is nothing you sell.

And a tip too you, write without misspelling, the is no point with a good story if not your teacher understand you.

And read the rules, many of your misspelling is against the rules.[/quote]
Thanks for the re-post of Un-Named’s post.

I recall reading not to ask others to write essays and so on for you, just help? Maybe wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: English help
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

saadra:

i will rep them

You don’t have the ability to rep yet.

Also, judging by your English skills, you really should do this one without any help from other people. :\
